name: Suspicious Gentle Sea Breeze
desc: A refreshing drink. A tidal wave of saltiness almost sweeps you off your feet, with not a single hint of sweet in the whole glass. Is this just a cup of blue-colored brine?

value.text: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

customize.name: Recipe: Gentle Sea Breeze
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Gentle Sea Breeze.

customize.name: Gentle Sea Breeze
customize.desc: A refreshing drink. Its vivid blue-to-white gradient is evocative of cresting waves caressed by the sea breeze. Having a sip of this while on a holiday is sure to fill your heart with ease.

customize.name: Delicious Gentle Sea Breeze
customize.desc: A refreshing drink. The light and gentle bubbles dance on the tip of your tongue. The sweetness of the fruit juice and the salty flavor of the soda blend together in perfect harmony, as though you're stepping through waves in time with the breeze. Cheers and laughter from the resort fill the air...

customize.name: Suspicious Gentle Sea Breeze
customize.desc: A refreshing drink. A tidal wave of saltiness almost sweeps you off your feet, with not a single hint of sweet in the whole glass. Is this just a cup of blue-colored brine?

customize.name: Quenepa Berry
customize.desc: Bluish, juicy berries that grow in large amounts near the Scions of the Canopy. Their shape is similar to that of Flamegranates.

customize.name: Mint
customize.desc: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.
